name: Telegram Voice Chat Music Player Bot
description: Telegram Bot to Play Audio in Telegram Voice Chats

API_ID.description: api_id part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: api_hash part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot token of Bot, get from @Botfather

SESSION_STRING.description: Session string, read the README to learn how to export it with Pyrogram

CHAT.description: ID of Channel or Group where the Bot plays Music

LOG_GROUP.description: ID of the group to send playlist If CHAT is a Group, if channel thenleave blank

ADMINS.description: ID of Users who can use Admin commands(for multiple users seperated by space)

STREAM_URL.description: URL of Radio station or Youtube live video url to stream with /radio command
